sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it is given that
\[
	\frac{r ^3 + 3 rs ^2 }{3r ^2 s + s ^3 } = \frac{m ^3 + 3 mn ^2}{3 m ^2 n + n ^3}
\]
Then prove that 
\[
	\frac{m }{r } = \frac{n }{s }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that
\[
	\frac{r ^3 + 3 rs ^2 }{3r ^2 s + s ^3 } = \frac{m ^3 + 3 mn ^2}{3 m ^2 n + n ^3}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
By using componendo and dividendo rule on both sides of the equation, we get
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{r ^3 + 3 r\input[s2v1]{} ^2 + 3r ^2 s + s ^3 }{r ^3 + 3 rs ^2 - 3r ^2 s - s ^3 } = \\
	\frac{m ^3 + 3 mn ^2 + 3 m ^2 n + n ^3}{m ^3 + 3 m\input[s2v2]{} ^2 - 3 m ^2 n - n ^3} 
\end{multline}"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{(r + \input[s3v1]{} )^3}{(\input[s3v2]{} - s )^3} = \frac{(m + n )^3}{(m - n )^3}
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{r + s }{r - \input[s4v1]{} } = \frac{m + \input[s4v2]{} }{m - n }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now apply componendo and dividendo on both sides of the equation again.
\[
	\frac{r }{\input[s5v1]{} } = \frac{\input[s5v2]{} }{n }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{m }{\input[s6v1]{} } = \frac{n }{\input[s6v2]{} }
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": ["s", "n"], "text": "Componendo and dividendo rule on the given equation will result in \begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{r ^3 + 3 rs ^2 + 3r ^2 s + s ^3 }{r ^3 + 3 rs ^2 - 3r ^2 s - s ^3 } = \\
	\frac{m ^3 + 3 mn ^2 + 3 m ^2 n + n ^3}{m ^3 + 3 mn ^2 - 3 m ^2 n - n ^3} 
\end{multline}"}, {"data": ["s", "r"], "text": "$$\text{The previous equation can also be written as $\frac{(r + s )^3}{(r - s )^3} = \frac{(m + n )^3}{(m - n )^3}$, as $(a+b)^3 = a^3 + 3ab^2 + 3a^2b + b^3$ and $(a-b)^3 = a^3 + 3ab^2 - 3a^2b - b^3$, for any $a$ and $b$.}$$"}, {"data": ["s", "n"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking cube root on both sides we get $\frac{r + s }{r - s } = \frac{m + n }{m - n }$}$$"}, {"data": ["s", "m"], "text": "$$\text{Upon applying componendo and dividendo we get $\frac{r }{s } = \frac{m }{n }$}$$"}, {"data": ["r", "s"], "text": "$$\text{Multiplying both sides by $\frac{n}{r}$, we get $\frac{m }{r } = \frac{n }{s }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
